NC.Q: Between the flows from node Pregnant Women to node Full Recovery and from node Deceased to node Emergency Care, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Deceased to node Emergency Care and from node Seniors to node Improved Condition, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Pregnant Women to node Improved Condition, from node Improved Condition to node Medication, and from node Adults to node Improved Condition, which path has the largest flow?
